summary: Provides shared pytest configuration for the MSS project, including fixtures, commandâ€‘line options, test data setup, temporary directory handling, and utilities for loading modules and managing GUI windows. It also supplies a mock keyring backend to supply deterministic passwords during tests.
business_intent: Enable reliable, repeatable automated testing of the MSS library by preparing a controlled test environment, mocking external dependencies such as the system keyring, and offering helper functions that simplify test setup and execution.
